49017	27	46	4	(do) you seek to hasten	tastaʿjilūna	تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

55946	35	3	3	Remember	udh'kurū	اذْكُرُوا
55947	35	3	4	(the) Favor	niʿ'mata	نِعْمَتَ
55948	35	3	5	(of) Allah	l-lahi	اللَّهِ
55949	35	3	6	upon you	ʿalaykum	عَلَيْكُمْ
55950	35	3	7	Is	hal	هَلْ
55951	35	3	8	(there) any	min	مِنْ

71519	63	1	16	the hypocrites	l-munāfiqīna	الْمُنَافِقِينَ
71520	63	1	17	(are) surely liars	lakādhibūna	لَكَاذِبُونَ
71521	63	2	1	They take	ittakhadhū	اتَّخَذُوا

71523	63	2	3	(as) a cover	junnatan	جُنَّةً
